headline: Does HP (HPQ) Look Mispriced After Prolonged Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether HP's share price reflects its real worth today, this article walks through the key numbers that matter for value focused investors. HP's stock closed at US$21.18 recently, with returns of 2.2% decline over 7 days, 14.4% decline over 30 days, 4.2% decline year to date, 32.2% decline over 1 year, 15.1% decline over 3 years, and 0.3% decline over 5 years. This performance has likely caught the attention of investors reassessing the balance between risk and potential...
